name: ma_playerstate
sql:
(playerstate) -> multiIf (
      playerstate = 'I',
      'Init',
      playerstate = 'C',
      'Connecting',
      playerstate = 'IB',
      'Init Buffering',
      playerstate = 'PL',
      'Playing',
      playerstate = 'B',
      'Rebuffering',
      playerstate = 'SK',
      'Seeking',
      playerstate = 'SB',
      'Seek Buffering',
      playerstate = 'PS',
      'Pausing',
      playerstate = 'RB',
      'Resume Buffering',
      playerstate = 'AL',
      'Ad Loading',
      playerstate = 'AP',
      'Ad Playing',
      playerstate = 'E',
      'End',
      playerstate
    )
